comments.body:
This hardcoded value may conflict with a non default cxx_compiler. I may be preferable to require an explicit rust toolchain entry in cbc.yaml that is zipped with the compiler settings.

It's probably hard enough to get this right and enough of a corner case that you should ignore it for now.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@if not exist "%CARGO_HOME%" mkdir "%CARGO_HOME%"

echo [target.x86_64-pc-windows-msvc]>> %CARGO_CONFIG%
if [%LD%] == [] (
    echo linker = "link.exe">> %CARGO_CONFIG%
